htmlPage.title: Podiatrists
htmlPage.body:
Podiatrists and Chiropodists Locum Job Agency

If you meet the requirements for UK Podiatrists jobs, register with PJ Locums to generate your CV. If successful, we will contact you to arrange an appointment on arrival in the UK.

Details:

Overseas candidates including EU members are required to register with the HPC www.hpc-uk.org in order to work in the UK, as this can take 2 - 3 months and therefore it is advisable to start the process before arriving in the UK. See the link below for HPC Contact details.

Our specialist consultants recruit Podiatrist / Chiropodists from the UK and internationally, matching individuals skills and experiences with customers needs, across both locum and permanent roles. A full police check is required prior to arrival in the U.K.

UK Grades are:

Basic - 6 months post qualifying experience

Senior II - 2 years post qualifying experience

Senior I - 4 years post qualifying experience

Locum Areas of Speciality for Podiatrists and Chiropodists:

  • You can work in either hospital or within challenging high risk clinics
  • Domiciliary caseloads
  • Podiatric surgery clinics

HPC registration and information can be obtained from the Health Professions Council.
